text: “ma nemeyi, sammuthi aanduwa thula sitina shrilanipa ye parlimenthu kandayamayi ehema kiyanne.

mema awasthawata saukhya sewa adhyaksha janaral waidya jayasundara bandara mahatha, athireka lekam (sanwardhana) janaka shri chandraguptha mahatha saha niyojya adhyaksha janaralwaru, adhyawarun athulu pirisak ekwa sitiyaha.
ranjan ramanayaka manthriwaraya pawasanne,aanduwa no sithu paridi mahajanathawa wetha saba thorathuru yamath samanga sajiwi wikashana nawatha damimata aanduwa uthsaha karana bawayi
namuth uma oye wathura giye mahawali gangatayi.
samanalith ee tharam daksha na kawi liyanna, eeth aasayi eewa rasawidinna……..

yam yam nithimaya thaththwayan samaga ee de karanne kohomada kiyana eka, aayathana pihituwima, ee sandaha pudgalayin pathkirima, me sankirna thaththwaya nirakaranaya karagen sakachcha karala katayuthu kirima awashyayi“
apita ithin me wage than wala wada korana kota godak pirisa suhada wenawa , ee wagema aduna gannath labenawa....
ee “galagiya rudhiraya” yanna wethayi.
adhika wegayen apa gaman karamin sitinne aniwarya wyasanayak karaya.
eekakari aadayam ratawa gihi diwiya gatalu athi karayi.
me hathara denama pathala nayakayek lesa salakena angoda lokka namaththage golabalayan bawa polisiya kiyayi.
ee nisa mama itha wishwasayen kiyanawa: minis aadaraya gana, manushyathwaya gana, apata magaharena jiwithaya gana hetath liyanawa.
samaharak wita maranayata lanwi tarminal awasthawe sitina bawata nirnaya karana lada roginta sapayana diyaramaya aahara nawathwa damathi.

wadi bara aththe ohu ese nokarana paththataya.
indriya damanaya mangin chiththa parishuddhiya sakshathkaranaya adahas karanu labe.

ohu mage karaya hadanawa.
ohuda ma samanga adahas walin kothek gatunada ma athahara noya sitinne ma ha sanwadayen yam ho deyak ithiri wana bawa pawasamini.
paribhogikaya aaraksha kirime aramunin paribhogika aarakshana panatha sanshodhanaya kirimata piyawara gena athi bawa karmantha ha wanija katayuthu amathya rishad badiyudin mahatha pawasayi.
obage dinapatha kiya wana wiyunusatahan atharata widagdha kathikawak janamana ruchikara lesa gena ena wiyunu lowa kumara wiyunuwa: “kiyanna” da ada ma ek kara ganna.
